title: =DRK= Battlefield 1942 v1.61 (Ripped w/Gamespy Bypass)
description:
This is the prepackaged Battlefield 1942 torrent for the =DRK= Drakelings community. All patches and updates have been installed (besides mods, which should still be downloaded and installed separately.) Download the torrent, extract the game (follow the directions) and play.

Battlefield 1942 is no longer available on Origin. This version of Battlefield 1942 is patched to bypass Gamespy's (no longer functioning) master server system. You should be able to join and play on underground Battlefield 1942 servers with this version
